socialMediaData.name: LinkedIn
socialMediaData.Description: Believe it or not, this is my most used social media platform. I like to spend hours looking at projects and ideas that people share. Simple idea brining about changes in the society is what inspires me the most.

socialMediaData.name: Twitter
socialMediaData.Description: My news feed social media. Reading opinions from people about the current trends keeps me up to date here. Some good news with a mix of epic sarcasm is a mix of tweets I enjoy the most.

socialMediaData.name: Instagram
socialMediaData.Description: I just love to watch good photography. This keeps me upto date with updates from my friend list. Amazing photography is what I love most. I am also a avid foodie and everytime I tune in to my account my appetite shoots up with yummy photos all over.
